name: Pop Shop Herbal Tea
description: Tea that’s pop? Huh? The blend of herbs and spices in this tea are similar in flavour to cola, but without all the added sugar.
preparation: Pour boiling water over tea bag. Steep 5–7 min.
Chill for iced tea. Top with club soda, if using.
tips: Try cold brewed iced tea. Fill a pitcher with cold water. For every 1 cup of water, add 1 tea bag. Refrigerate at least 2 hours or overnight. Remove tea bags and enjoy for up to 4 days!

products.name: Pop Shop Herbal Tea Blend
summary: Our cola-flavoured Pop Shop Herbal Tea Blend offers a healthy and guilt-free way to relive our childhood memories of sipping on cold cola. Made with natural ingredients, this tea offers the anti-inflammatory properties of cinnamon and licorice root to help boost our immune systems. Suitable for kids from 1 to 101, this tea is an excellent alternative to sugary soft drinks.
